name: Wonder Tsum
description:
Wonder Tsum is a game we made both for ludum dare and for games on demand (we're sorry we couldn't make exactly the game claudia wanted !  But it was a great inspiration and we hope you guys in toronto will like it.)

-------

Help Wonder Tsum to reach the end of the puzzles. Make it grow, but not too much. Divide it when you have to. Don't worry, it won't get hurt ! If you're stuck, just retry !

-Ludum Dare Page-

Team:

Game Designers:   Nicolas Noël,  RandoMalo

Programmers:   Suliac Blineau, François Candela

2D Graphist: Solène Larcher

Music and sound design:   Aurelien Demey

Project Manager:   Aymeric Manceau

Special thanks: Claudia from the Games on Demand jam.

------
